 Mohamed Sharief  
Senior  Security Consultant  
 
 
 
 
PERSONAL SUMMARY  
 
A Technical Consultant with extensive knowledge in Cyber Security/Network Security 
domains and more than 8  years of experience in IT industry.

CERTIFICATIONS:

WORK EXPERIENCE   
 
Mideast Data Systems (MDS) – Abu Dhabi, UAE  
 
Sr. Security  Consultant July 2019 – Present  
 
Duties :  
 Ability to  drive complex deployments while working side by side with the customers to 
resolve their unique problems.  
 Perform remote and on -site customization, installation, integration, and training of the 
solutions.  
 Responsible of implementing the following produc ts; Palo Alto NGFW & 
TRAPS/Cortex XDR & Prisma, FortiGate, FortiClient & FortiSandbox, LogRhythm, 
Infoblox, FireEye Network Security & Endpoint Security,  Symantec EDR & Endpoint 
Protection,  Vectra  AI, Trend Micro Apex  One, Deep Security & TippingPoint, Cen trify, 
MobileIron, EclecticIQ, SpyCloud,  Digital Shadows  & Ixia . 
 Present technical material in a clear, organized briefing to a mix of technical and non -
technical personnel . 
 Provide configurations, troubleshooting and best practices to customers.  
 Provide f ault isolation and root cause analysis for technical issues.  
 Continuously improve knowledge of current and emerging IT Security threats, 
vulnerabilities, their detection and mitigation.  
 PROFESSIONAL  
 
 
 
PERSONAL DETAILS  
 
Mohamed Sharief  
Abu Dhabi, UAE  
 
M: +971 565344959

Nationality: Sudanese  
Language : Arabic & English  
Visa Status:  Employment  Visa
